name: Dominique
description:
In this short top-down scoring game, you help Dominique, the last creatures of their kind, to perpetuate their species thanks to their ability to procreate with anything.

You have to give your love to as many elements as possible in 1 minute, approaching them and realizing QTE.

We made this prototype with Bastinus Rex for the Global Game Jam 2018 ! The theme is "Transmission".

HOW TO PLAY ?

- Move by using ZQSD.
- Get close to the different elements and use the arrow keys to procreate.

  We hope you'll like it !

Bastinus Rex @BastinusRex
Thob @Thobinambours
